tooltip.output_name: The file name without an extension.
tooltip.resolution:
LR2SD works properly at 256x256 and 512x512.
Beatoraja is intended to run at 720p resolution.
If the aspect ratio does not match, the empty space will be filled
according to the method specified in the next menu.
tooltip.fps: Use 30 fps to ensure playback on LR2SD.
tooltip.buffer: An appropriate buffer size is required to ensure playback on LR2.
tooltip.mux: Increase it until no buffer underflow occurs.
tooltip.mux_auto: When enabled, the entered MUX rate is used as the starting value.
tooltip.codec: Use MPEG-1 for LR2 video playback.
tooltip.letterbox:
Choose how to fill the letterbox area
when the source and target aspect ratios differ.
tooltip.letterbox_disabled:
Aspect ratios match;
no letterbox processing is required.
tooltip.letterbox_color: Select the solid color used for the letterbox area.
tooltip.letterbox_blur: Adjusts the blur radius of the background (4–120). Higher values produce a softer background.
tooltip.letterbox_blur_brightness: Adjusts the brightness of the blurred background (20%–100%). Lower values make it darker.
